label: social_support
src_text: It's not my fault that you have such low standards.
augmented_text: Your standards are your own, and I'm more than happy to offer assistance if you ever need it.

label: social_support
src_text: Haha, glad you enjoyed my predicament.
augmented_text: I'm glad my struggle lightened your mood, lol!

label: social_support
src_text: Haha, glad you enjoyed my predicament.
augmented_text: Hehe, it's great that my tough spot could brighten your day.

label: social_support
src_text: You made me compile a series of photos of us as friends.
augmented_text: Together, we've crafted an incredible picture collection that encapsulates our strong bond as friends.

label: social_support
src_text: When I got done he was like, you've never done that before!
augmented_text: After you completed it, everyone was shocked and impressed that it was your first attempt!

label: social_support
src_text: I personally agree with your statement that we determine our rights and are in control of our destiny.
augmented_text: Yes, you're absolutely right! We have the power to choose our paths and the rights we want to uphold.

label: social_support
src_text: Congratulations and thanks for sharing your story and giving me hope that our relationship can work.
augmented_text: Your success brings me hope and encouragement for the future of my relationship—kudos to you!

label: social_support
src_text: Maybe Russ has been listening to too much Basshunter, but I like your idea much better.
augmented_text: It seems Russ' Basshunter obsession is getting intense, but your idea is the one I'm rooting for!

label: social_support
src_text: I guess this is just where we disagree, but thank you for he thoughtful response.
augmented_text: We don't share the same viewpoint, but your heartfelt reply means a lot.

label: social_support
src_text: My heart breaks for you.. please know we're sending you both love and good vibes.
augmented_text: Wishing you some much-needed strength, just remember that love and good vibes are with you always. 💜💫
